description: Structured answer template for NoelIQ responses

template.answer_text: Main answer in conversational New Zealand English, 2-4 sentences for simple questions

recommended_attachments.name: Product Name
recommended_attachments.why_sell: Reason to sell (e.g., 'to get Dolby Atmos', 'to protect the screen')

availability.fulfilment: Available in-store today or click & collect from nearby stores

alternative_if_oos.why_this_alt: Why this is a good alternative (e.g., 'Similar features and performance')
alternative_if_oos.key_diff: Key difference (e.g., 'This one is brighter but doesn't have Dolby Vision')

notes.answer_text: Should be ready for rep to read aloud to customer
notes.key_sell_points: Top 3-5 most relevant selling points from context
notes.recommended_attachments: From product.recommended_attachments, with why_sell contextualized to question
notes.availability: Always included if store_id provided, even if null values
notes.citations: Internal chunk IDs for audit trail, not displayed to customer
